title: Wonderfully Rehabbed Edgewater Two bedroom! New Kitchen!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Call Apartment Guys at 773-549-3474 and ask for reference #2202710. Enjoy quality at an affordable price for an Edgewater fully updated two bedroom! Located in the Brynmawr historic district near the lake. Easy access to shopping, transportation, parks and beaches. Heat included, electricity and internet are all included!  Laundry and fitness center on site! Most pets ok!  Prices are subject to change. ***Photos may be of a similar unit.****For faster response best to call or text 773-549-3474 with reference #2202710
